summary: Results-driven Army veteran with 7+ years of HR and personnel management experience. Proven expertise in coordinating operations, managing personnel records for 200+ individuals, and achieving 98% efficiency ratings. Active Secret clearance. Seeking Project Manager opportunities to leverage military leadership and organizational skills in civilian sector.

mos_codes.title: Human Resources Specialist
mos_codes.soc_title: Human Resources Assistants, Except Payroll and Timekeeping
mos_codes.onet_occupation: Human Resources Assistants, Except Payroll and Timekeeping

experience.title: Human Resources Specialist
bullets: Managed personnel records for 200+ soldiers, ensuring 100% accuracy and compliance with Army regulations
Coordinated benefits administration for battalion of 500+ personnel, processing 150+ actions monthly with zero errors
Supervised team of 8 HR specialists in daily operations, maintaining 98% efficiency rating across all metrics
Implemented digital filing system that reduced processing time by 40% and improved record retrieval efficiency

experience.title: Team Leader
bullets: Led team of 8 personnel in daily HR operations, maintaining 98% efficiency rating across all performance metrics
Managed personnel records for 200+ soldiers, ensuring 100% accuracy and regulatory compliance
Coordinated training programs for 50+ new recruits, achieving 95% completion rate within timeline
Streamlined onboarding process that reduced new hire processing time from 5 days to 3 days

experience.title: Project Coordinator
bullets: Coordinated cross-functional teams of 20+ staff to deliver veteran support programs, improving response time by 30%
Developed project tracking dashboards using Excel and Power BI to monitor key performance metrics

education.overview: Nine week course focused on Division Officer leadership through practical instruction in navigation, seamanship, and ship handling both in the classroom and in simulators.

education.degree: Naval Diesel Plant Engineering Officer Course
education.overview: Studied advanced topics regarding a Naval warship's diesel and electrical plant, support services to include fuel and lubrication systems, hydraulics, air compressors, power distribution systems, and heat exchange cooling systems. Graduated #4 out of 30 Naval Surface Warfare Officers

veteran_experience: Mentor - American Corporate Partners (ACP), guiding transitioning service members

volunteer.description: Mentored at-risk youth from military families, providing guidance on academic achievement, career planning, and personal development. Organized monthly activities focused on building leadership and communication skills.
